title: Implement issue_prioritization score computation (frequency + severity + ARR tier) using persisted config

sections.text: Add a scoring computation module/service that loads the active scoring configuration per workspace and calculates an issue’s total priority score from frequency, severity, and ARR tier. The service should return both the total score and an explainable breakdown (per-factor contributions and any normalization applied). Handle missing/unknown ARR tiers and incomplete severity data with defined fallbacks so scoring is stable and deterministic.
